comments:
The following errors related to Managed Agent Explorer plugins are written to the eclipse log when eclipse starts.  These messages should not appear in the log.  I was using the TPTP-4.4.0-200703231328 build.

These messages should be addressed but I don't know the effects of these messages.  That is, I don't know if or how they affect the functionality.
Patch attached. Effect on functionality to be tested by JMX team.

Created an attachment (id=61969)
Fixes the class not found exception

Earlier, an the LaunchAgentImageProvider from the managedagent.wsdm pluginw as specified. That class has since moved. So added a LaunchAgentImageProvider, the corresponding icon and changed the plugin.xml.

Created an attachment (id=61983)
Refactoring of package names

Upgrading severity to blocker and it needs to be fixed for i2 testing because I just tried the MAX with JMX to manage Apache Tomcat and the agent did not show in the Profiling Monitor view and the following exceptions were written to the eclipse log.  I don't know if this problem is caused by the earlier messages.  Please investigate:
